summary: LUCKILY I WAS DRIVING IN A PARKING LOT AND HAD JUST CROSSED A SPEED BUMP.  MY SPARE TIRE FELL OFF THE UNDERSIDE OF THE TRUCK.  THE SPARE TIRE CABLE HAD BROKEN.  AS OF THIS DATE I HAVE NOT YET NOTIFIED THE DEALER.  AS THIS IS A SAFETY ISSUE I FULLY EXPECT FORD TO PAY FOR THE REPLACEMENT.  I COULD HAVE BEEN TRAVELING ON THE FREEWAY AND CAUSED A HUGE ACCIDENT WHEN THE CABLE BROKE AND DROPPED THE TIRE.   *JB
